## build variable

Builds project for production.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
build: TaskOptions<import("./config").SetConfigHooks & import("./project").SetProjectHooks & import("./local").BuildLocalModulesHooks & import("./routes").BuildRoutesModulesHooks & import("./vendor").BuildVendorModulesHooks, never>
```

## Remarks

It contains the following sub `task options`<!-- -->(in `series` mode).

- set `context.building` to `true`

- [\`set context\`](./packer.setcontext.md)

- [\`build local module\`](./packer.buildlocalmodules.md) and [\`build routes module\`](./packer.buildroutesmodule.md) (in `parallel` mode)

- [\`build vendor module\`](./packer.buildvendormodules.md)

- [\`build entry\`](./packer.buildentry.md)

- [write the info of this build to disk](./packer.write.md)
